title: Is the PS5 Ugly or Beautiful?
description:
Is the PS5 an S-Tier console or F-Tier?! 

From this episode of Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g3QPW5SCchI&pp=ygUJZ2FtZXNjYXN0

Go to http://harrys.com/KINDAFUNNY for a $3 Trial Set.
Head over to KindaFunny.com/store to pick up your copy of Portillo the Wiener Dog Thinks He’s a Manatee and the new line of Portillo merch!"

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
